name: places/ChIJAbXck99ZwokR5-ZOeCuIaqw
formattedAddress: 301 E 87th St Suite 1E, New York, NY 10128, USA
adrFormatAddress: 301 E 87th St Suite 1E, New York, NY 10128, USA

originalText.text:
Transcendental NYC is an amazing, if not the best option you’d choose, dental office.

Dr Marjan is an excellent dentist. She’s not only skilled and knowledgeable but also very patient. She will go the extra mile for her patients.

The hygienist is equally great. Her attention to detail as she does her cleaning is exceptional. She also educates her clients with oral hygiene practices to keep their teeth clean.

The ladies in their front office are also amazing, accommodating and friendly to the patients/clients.

If you’re looking for a forever dental office, this is a terrific choice.

originalText.text:
I highly recommend Transcendental NYC and Dr Marjan and Tori and Maria and the whole staff !
I have had pretty extensive work on my teeth with Dr. Marjan for past two years. She has performed every procedure perfectly.. and with continual consideration to how I was feeling during the procedures. The results of all of them were perfect.
She has done difficult extractions with consideration of my previous neck cancer and the after effects I have from the cancer.  She has given me a beautiful, excellent fitting partial, and gorgeous crowns.
I trust her to do any procedure I may have to do in the future !!
I am 79 years old and I have some neck and shoulder impairments from my radiation treatment of the neck cancer.  She positioned me carefully and did all procedures perfectly !
In addition to her skill , she has such a thoughtful staff as I mentioned. Maria even dropped off something I forgot there so I wouldn’t have to take a return trip on the bus !

I feel much more comfortable with the status of my teeth than I did two years ago… and I feel much more comfortable with them going forward !
I don’t hesitate to highly recommend Dr. Marjan .. and her staff !
Sincerely,
Mike Tarquinio

originalText.text: Transcendental is a great practice with professional staff, fair pricing, helpful reminders, and nothing shady for profit. Dr. Mohajer is not only a meticulous and knowledgeable dentist but also a nice and friendly person. She explains everything and makes you feel comfortable. She sees both adults and kids.

text.text: Transcendental is a great practice with professional staff, fair pricing, helpful reminders, and nothing shady for profit. Dr. Mohajer is not only a meticulous and knowledgeable dentist but also a nice and friendly person. She explains everything and makes you feel comfortable. She sees both adults and kids.

originalText.text: Everyone in the  office, from reception, to the hygienist, to the dentist were beyond patient and accommodating. They took their time to explain everything that was going to happen to me and made sure I was physically comfortable in the space before beginning treatment. As someone with severe dental anxiety I’ve struggled to find a dentist that not only took my fears seriously, but had medical options such as nitrous and numbing gel during my cleaning to help ease the stress. Will definitely be making them my primary Dentist.

originalText.text: One of the best dentist if not the BEST in New York City. I've been an Invisalign patient with Dr. Marjan, and my journey has been nothing short of exceptional. Dr. Marjan is not only friendly but also incredibly informative, taking the time to explain every step of my treatment and addressing all my questions. Her welcoming and professional staff have made me feel at ease from day one. I have never been given a bad attitude from them. Always welcomed with a smile. The comfortable waiting area and pleasant music add to the overall positive atmosphere. I'm eagerly looking forward to my final smile, and the progress I've seen so far thanks to Dr. Marjan has me thrilled with my choice.
